'A Rune-keeper come to Archet? It is not very often I am called upon to train new apprentices, but I shall do what I can.

'The Rune-keeper is a master of balanceâ€”a wielder of runes and language itself. Attune yourself to your surroundings and a precise word might strike as deeply as the keenest blade!

'Do you see these training-dummies the others use to hone their skills? Focus on one of them and unleash your <rgb=#00ff00>Fiery Ridicule</rgb> upon it!

HINT: Rune-keepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells. <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills. Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>green</rgb> backgrounds.
'Very good, [placeholder]! In time, you may prove yourself a worthy Rune-keeper, but do not forget what you have learned.'

'You should level your Fiery Ridicule against one of the nearby training-dummies. Once you feel confident in your ability, return to me. The Rune-keeper Trainer is in Archet.\n\nNow that you have successfully used Fiery Ridicule, you should return to your trainer and tell them of your success.
